mapper.insert: insert into vote_option(option_id, vote_id, option_content, option_order, cnt) values(#{optionId}, #{voteId}, #{optionContent}, #{optionOrder}, #{cnt});

insert into vote_table( vote_id, uid, vote_type, vote_title, vote_content, vote_tag, view_times, vote_cnt, vote_status, create_date, end_date) values(#{voteId}, #{uid}, #{voteType}, #{voteTitle}, #{voteContent}, #{voteTag}, #{viewTimes}, #{voteCnt}, #{voteStatus}, #{createDate}, #{endDate});
mapper.select: select * from vote_option where vote_id = #{voteId} order by option_order;
select * from vote_table order by create_date desc limit 0, #{cnt};
select * from vote_table where create_date < #{createDate} order by create_date desc limit 0, #{cnt};
select * from vote_record where uid = #{uid} and vote_id = #{voteId};
